description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a buck converter for hypersonic vehicle flight computer. Input: 270V DC MIL-STD-704F bus, Output: 28V at 15A. Must survive 5000°C external temperature with active cooling, handle 50g vibration, and maintain operation through plasma communication blackout.

Design a flyback converter for nuclear reactor containment instrumentation. Input: 125V DC safety bus, Output: 24V isolated at 5A. Must survive 40-year design life, 10⁸ rad total dose, and seismic Category I (0.5g SSE) requirements.

Design a boost converter for radioisotope thermoelectric generator (RTG) interface on deep space probe. Input: 28V-32V from RTG (decreasing over mission), Output: 100V at 2A for ion thruster PPU. Must operate for 20-year mission with no maintenance, survive Jupiter radiation belts.

Design a forward converter for electric aircraft emergency power distribution. Input: 540V DC from main bus, Output: 28V at 50A. Must provide 30 minutes backup from emergency battery during dual engine failure, meet DO-160G, and survive lightning strike (Level 3).

Design a SEPIC converter for AUV main power. Input: 21V-33.6V from 7S Li-ion pack, Output: 24V at 10A for propulsion and sensors. Must survive 6000m depth (600 bar), operate in pressure-compensated oil, and handle 3-month submerged missions without maintenance.

Design a half-bridge resonant converter for superconducting magnet power supply. Input: 480V 3-phase rectified (650V DC), Output: 10V at 1000A for dipole magnet. Must achieve <10ppm current stability, survive quench events, and ramp at 100A/s controllably.

Design a buck converter for EV battery thermal management heater. Input: 400V battery pack, Output: 300V at 20A (6kW) for PTC heater. Must provide smooth power modulation from 0-6kW, survive -40°C cold soak, and integrate with vehicle CAN bus for BMS control.

Design a flyback converter for space telescope CCD bias supply. Input: 28V from spacecraft bus, Output: -40V at 50mA for CCD substrate bias. Must achieve <100μV noise, survive total dose 100krad, and operate in cryogenic environment (-150°C).

Design a full-bridge converter for high-speed train (350km/h) HVAC and lighting. Input: 1500V DC from catenary via main transformer, Output: 400V 3-phase AC at 50kVA. Must survive pantograph bouncing, meet EN 50121 EMC, and operate in tunnels (restricted ventilation).

Design a Ćuk converter for mass spectrometer ion source. Input: 24V lab supply, Output: -150V at 100mA. Must achieve <1mV ripple, <10ppm/°C temperature coefficient, and survive high-voltage arc events from the ion source.
